meanings.definition: The youngest child in a family.
meanings.sent1: The ultimogenitures in the family always gets special attention.
meanings.sent2: As the ultimogenitures, she was used to being pampered by her older siblings.
meanings.sent3: The ultimogenitures decided to play a prank on their older siblings.
meanings.sent4: Being the ultimogenitures felt like being the star of the show.
meanings.sent5: The ultimogenitures' cheerful nature brightened up the whole family.

meanings.definition: The youngest offspring in a family who inherits the entire estate.
meanings.sent1: The ultimogenitures was thrilled to inherit the family estate.
meanings.sent2: In the will, the ultimogenitures was named as the sole heir of the estate.
meanings.sent3: The ultimogenitures couldn't believe their luck in inheriting everything.
meanings.sent4: The ultimogenitures' inheritance was like a golden ticket to a new life.
meanings.sent5: The ultimogenitures' responsibility grew with the vast estate they inherited.
